quotes.text: The possession of knowledge does not kill the sense of wonder and mystery. There is always more mystery.
quotes.author: Ana√Øs Nin

quotes.text: The man of knowledge must be able not only to love his enemies but also to hate his friends.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.text: Bodily exercise, when compulsory, does no harm to the body; but knowledge which is acquired under compulsion obtains no hold on the mind.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.text: Knowledge has three degrees: opinion, science, illumination. The means or instrument of the first is sense; of the second, dialectic; of the third, intuition.
quotes.author: Plotinus

quotes.text: Learning never exhausts the mind.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.text: Learning is finding out what you already know.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.text: I'm not afraid of storms, for I'm learning how to sail my ship.
quotes.author: Louisa May Alcott

quotes.text: An organization's ability to learn, and translate that learning into action rapidly, is the ultimate competitive advantage.
quotes.author: Jack Welch

quotes.text: We come to love not by finding a perfect person, but by learning to see an imperfect person perfectly.
quotes.author: Sam Keen

quotes.text: It is a characteristic of wisdom not to do desperate things.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.text: The problem with Google is you have 360 degrees of omnidirectional information on a linear basis, but the algorithms for irony and ambiguity are not there. And those are the algorithms of wisdom.
quotes.author: William Hurt

quotes.text: One's philosophy is not best expressed in words; it is expressed in the choices one makes... and the choices we make are ultimately our responsibility.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: In every walk with nature, one receives far more than he seeks.
quotes.author: John Muir

quotes.text: In the sky there are no tracks. Outside there is no recluse. There are no conditioned things that are eternal. There is no instability in the Buddhas.
quotes.author: The Buddha

quotes.text: You can't shake hands with a clenched fist.
quotes.author: Indira Gandhi

quotes.text: Your sacred space is where you can find yourself again and again.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.text: Patience is a form of wisdom. It demonstrates that we understand and accept the fact that sometimes things must unfold in their own time.
quotes.author: Jon Kabat-Zinn

quotes.text: Whoever doesn't flare up at someone who's angry wins a battle hard to win.
quotes.author: The Buddha

quotes.text: As a water bead on a lotus leaf, as water on a red lily, does not adhere, so the sage does not adhere to the seen, the heard, or the sensed.
quotes.author: The Buddha

quotes.text: The teacher who is indeed wise does not bid you to enter the house of his wisdom but rather leads you to the threshold of your mind.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.text: If you want a thing done well, do it yourself.
quotes.author: Napoleon

quotes.text: We should not judge people by their peak of excellence; but by the distance they have traveled from the point where they started.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.text: It has long been an axiom of mine that the little things are infinitely the most important.
quotes.author: Arthur Conan Doyle

quotes.text: Let my skin and sinews and bones dry up, together with all the flesh and blood of my body! I welcome it! But I will not move from this spot until I have attained the supreme and final wisdom.
quotes.author: The Buddha

quotes.text: If you would take, you must first give, this is the beginning of intelligence.
quotes.author: Laozi

quotes.text: The more you like yourself, the less you are like anyone else, which makes you unique.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.text: One who is too insistent on his own views, finds few to agree with him.
quotes.author: Laozi

quotes.text: A monarchy conducted with infinite wisdom and infinite benevolence is the most perfect of all possible governments.
quotes.author: Ezra Stiles

quotes.text: If you know the enemy and know yourself, you need not fear the result of a hundred battles.
quotes.author: Sun Tzu
